short_description: Discover Burundi, a small landlocked East African nation known for its hilly landscapes, Lake Tanganyika, and rich cultural heritage. Explore the capital Bujumbura, experience traditional drumming, and immerse yourself in the warm hospitality of the Burundian people.

health.tap_water_safety: Not safe to drink - bottled or filtered water is recommended
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, restaurants, and stores

tipping.hotels: Small tips for porters and housekeeping are appreciated
tipping.guides: 10% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 10% tip is customary for good service, though not always expected
tipping.taxis: Rounding up the fare is common

weather.title: Burundi has a tropical highland climate with moderate temperatures due to its elevation. The country experiences two distinct seasons: a dry season from June to September and a wet season from October to May, with two rainy periods.

when_to_visit.title: Dry Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Cooler and drier weather, making this the best time to visit. Perfect for exploring cities, visiting Lake Tanganyika, and outdoor activities. Ideal conditions for sightseeing and cultural experiences

when_to_visit.title: Shoulder Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Transition periods with occasional rain showers. Still manageable for travel, but be prepared for some rainfall. Good time to visit before or after the peak dry season

when_to_visit.title: Wet Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Heavy rainfall during two rainy periods (October to December and February to May). Challenging conditions for travel, with flooding possible in some areas. Lush green landscapes but difficult for outdoor activities

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Burundi is during the dry season from June to September when the weather is cooler and drier, making it ideal for exploring cities, visiting Lake Tanganyika, and outdoor activities
